title: As the Communication Hero, I Formed the World’s Strongest Party with a Cool Big Sister - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Yuri
tags: Dark   Depictions of Cruelty   Kind Love Interests   Multiple POV   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Sword And Magic
author: ネコ太郎
description:
After living a crappy life full of tragedy and struggles with communicating, online game-addict Haruka Nanase dies in a hiking accident and ends up reincarnated into a fantasy world. After running afoul of some criminals, she is saved by a cool heroine, who almost immediately asks her to be her (fake) girlfriend and then her adventuring partner.

Their story truly begins when they discover Haruka’s special communication skills in a world where magic relies on the power of words.>
